ISSUE.TITLE: Editor role- download CSV not allowed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.84.16** - open country table - enable 'editor' preview mode - download CSV ``` GET /api/v1/db/meta/tables/md_us58ca8gz6q6i1 304 - - 5.017 ms projectAclMiddleware :: Forbidden [Error]: csvDataExport - editor : Not allowed at Function.forbidden (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/catchError.ts:47:11) at projectAclMiddleware (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/ncMetaAclMw.ts:63:17) at /Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/catchError.ts:6:20 at Layer.handle [as handle_request] (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/layer.js:95:5) at next (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/route.js:137:13) at authMiddleware (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/ncMetaAclMw.ts:23:7) at /Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/catchError.ts:6:20 at Layer.handle [as handle_request] (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/layer.js:95:5) at next (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/node_modules/express/lib/router/route.js:137:13) at exports.default (/Users/rajuudava/NocoDB/nocodb/packages/nocodb/src/lib/noco/meta/helpers/extractProjectIdAndAuthenticate.ts:141:5) GET /api/v1/db/data/noco/stupid_flyingfish/Country/views/Country/export/csv?offset=0 403 46 - 4.161 ms ```
